quote_first: At the fatal stroke of the clock the whole assembly rushed from their places as if a fire had broken out. When I asked a colleague what it all meant, the old notary, who had heard my question, replied: ‘The primary duty of a Government employe is punctuality, sir!’ At
quote_last: not a soul was left in one of the rooms.
title: The Red Room
author: August Strindberg

quote_first: I’m not dead. How did that happen? He was right. It was
quote_last: and twenty-six seconds. Destiny had not been fulfilled. We all looked at each other, confused.
title: The Woman Who Died a Lot
author: Jasper Fforde
